Name: Lilac Scones
Description: Lightly sweetened, these go quite well with a cup of tea.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Ligeramente endulzado, estos van muy bien con una taza de té.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 부드러운 단맛이 나며, 차 한잔과 잘 어울립니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Leicht gesüßt schmecken sie gut zu einer Tasse Tee.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Levemente adoçados, estes vão muito bem com uma xícara de chá.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Слегка подслащенная и прекрасно сочетается с чашкой чая.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 微甜，配上一杯茶再好不过了。
